alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 4:13PM EDT until September 08 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Northwestern New Haven County in southern Connecticut... North central Westchester County in southeastern New York... Eastern Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brewster, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Danbury and Ridgefield around 420 PM EDT. Bethel and Brookfield around 425 PM EDT. Newtown around 430 PM EDT. Southbury around 435 PM EDT. Middlebury around 445 PM EDT. Waterbury and Naugatuck around 450 PM EDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
